** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:blocks_attacks}}: When present, this item can be used like a shield to block attacks to the holding player.
*** {{nbt|float|block_delay_seconds}}: The amount of time (in seconds) that {{control|use}} must be held before successfully blocking attacks. Defaults to {{cd|0}}.
*** {{nbt|float|disable_cooldown_scale}}: The multiplier applied to the cooldown time for the item when attacked by a disabling attack (the multiplier for {{nbt|float|disable_blocking_for_seconds}} on the [[Data component format#weapon|{{cd|minecraft:weapon}}]] component). If set to {{cd|0}}, this item can never be disabled by attacks. Defaults to {{cd|1}}.
*** {{nbt|list|damage_reductions}}: Controls how much damage should be blocked in a given attack.
**** {{nbt|compound}}: A damage reduction field
***** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|list|type}}: {{json_ref|damage type|tag=1}} to block. Defaults to all damage types.
***** {{nbt|float|base}}: The constant amount of damage to be blocked.
***** {{nbt|float|factor}}: The fraction of the dealt damage to be blocked.
***** {{nbt|float|horizontal_blocking_angle}}: strictly positive float &mdash; The maximum angle between the users facing direction and the direction of the incoming attack to be blocked. Defaults to {{cd|90}}
*** {{nbt|compound|item_damage}}: Controls how much damage should be applied to the item from a given attack.
**** {{nbt|float|threshold}}: The minimum amount of damage dealt by the attack before item damage is applied to the item. Defaults to {{cd|0}}.
**** {{nbt|float|base}}: The constant amount of damage applied to the item, if threshold is passed. Defaults to {{cd|0}}.
**** {{nbt|float|factor}}: The fraction of the dealt damage that should be applied to the item, if threshold is passed. Defaults to {{cd|1.5}}. 
*** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|block_sound}}: {{json_ref|sound event|inline=1}} to play when an attack is successfully blocked. Defaults to none.
**** {{nbt inherit/sound event|sounds}}
*** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|disabled_sound}}: {{json_ref|sound event|inline=1}} to play when the item goes on its disabled cooldown due to an attack. Defaults to none.
**** {{nbt inherit/sound event|sounds}}
*** {{nbt|string|bypassed_by}}: a damage type [[tag]] with {{cd|#}} of [[damage types]] that bypass the blocking. Defaults to none.
